EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Platform Roadshow-Spring Q414.CPR-Sydney
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Platform Roadshow: Sydney November 6
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/sydney> If you are concerned with the business end of your organisation, want to know why Platform as a Service (PaaS) is getting the ears of the board? Want to know how it can change the way you compete in the market via technology innovation? Who Should Attend
This seminar is geared to those in R&D, operations, finance, innovation and IT concerned with applications, cloud and big data. The content is of value to anyone concerned with organizational risk. AGENDA
8:30 AM – 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:30 AM Innovation: Who's Doing It Using PaaS?
10:30 AM – 10:45 AM Morning Tea
10:45 AM – 12:00 PM Lab 1 - The Developer Experience
12:00 PM – 12:30 PM Lunch
12:30 PM – 2:00 PM Workshop - Lab 2 - Architecture and the Operator Experience
Register now <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/sydney> for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. THURSDAY November 6, 2014 Cliftons Sydney Level 13/60 Margaret Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia Register <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/sydney> KEYNOTE PRESENTER Simon Elisha is sought after by C-Level Executives who want rare insights into technologies such as Cloud Computing, Big Data and Agile software development that are changing the way businesses compete, reduce costs and adapt quickly.
